summary: All P2 features backend APIs tested successfully. 26/26 tests passed. Cap Table Scenario Modeling, Email Campaigns, Workflow Builder, and ML Bank Reconciliation all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Tests create and cleanup TEST_ prefixed scenarios, campaigns, and workflows
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P2 backend APIs verified working. Cap Table returns 3 templates, Workflow Builder returns 4 templates, Email Campaigns seed creates 4 default templates, ML Reconciliation analyze endpoint works with rule-based matching.

cap_table_scenario_templates.description: GET /api/ib-capital/scenario/templates returns 3 templates: startup_seed_to_a, growth_b_to_c, bridge_round

cap_table_quick_simulation.description: POST /api/ib-capital/scenario/simulate-quick calculates dilution correctly (price per share, new shares, dilution factor)

cap_table_create_scenario.description: POST /api/ib-capital/scenario/create creates scenario with draft status

email_campaigns_seed_templates.description: POST /api/email-campaigns/templates/seed creates 4 default templates: Welcome Email, Invoice Reminder, Newsletter, Promotional Offer

email_campaigns_create_campaign.description: POST /api/email-campaigns/campaigns creates campaign with draft status

workflow_builder_templates.description: GET /api/workflows/templates/list returns 4 templates: invoice_overdue_reminder, payment_received_notification, new_lead_assignment, contract_expiry_alert

workflow_builder_run_workflow.description: POST /api/workflows/{id}/run triggers manual workflow execution and returns run_id

ml_bank_reconciliation_analyze.description: POST /api/ib-finance/ml-reconcile/analyze analyzes transactions and returns match suggestions with confidence scores

authentication_enforcement.description: All protected endpoints return 401 without auth token
